divs: sighting detailshello, im ***** i hope im not the first to contact you saying this, but new jersey has a high traffic level in regards to ufo's. i don't want to bore you with every account of mine but one that spooked me, and continues to is the "clark incident #1" [i name them so i can keep track]. i am witness to a ufo hovering 1000ft. or less above a home on the boarder of clark\rahway nj. im not sure if it disturbs me more being the only one who seemed to notice and care at the time or the actual ufo, but there is no way anyone should of missed this or confused it for anything less than what it was. to offer up some constructive criticism of my own, the only other object it could have been is a military harrier jet. there was no helicopter sounds, it was to low not to hear and it didn't move the trees so to me that said no residual air created from the propeller blades. i know where the house is if an investigation needed to be done on that issue in regards to military personal living at the address. im 22 and very conscious on all matters. i not sending this because im confused or need you to tell me what i already know. im sending this because i would love the chance to share. space travel, multi-dimensionals, occult etc. you don't need to dumb down your speech and diction with me. life outside of planet terra is evident���..very evident. during the same time frame as this account, i later saw a fleet in the sky about 7,000ft up, descending height for a plane, in my travels back home. i was not under the influence of any substance and i wasn't driving so i got the chance to clearly view what i was witnessing. they try to imitate planes but 10+ wouldn't be clumped within 60,000sq ft of sky circling the area. they were doing rounds like a security guard walking the grounds of a building every hour. 2: its close proximity to the ground considering its a well lit flying object. 6: the ufo's must have been doing their rounds over the area i was in at the time i saw them. i was in route to another city so distance is why i lost sight of them. i would love to speak with john.
Summary: "Clark Incident #1" Strange objects over homes & fleets on the move !!
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Rahway
There were no other sightings in Rahway on or around March 11th 2013
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
